thread.title: Steven

author: Steven
title: Steven
text: I ordered a Kwansan Cherry Tree, bareroot, from this nursery. The shipping was prompt and the tree arrived in a narrow box in good condition. The product was the correct height and as described online. I thought the tree was pruned a bit too much but in 3 weeks has started to leave out and is doing satisfactory. I called the nursery to learn how long this species requires to recover from being shipped in a dormant, bareroot state and spoke with an individual who knew this information. I am very satisfied with this nursery and my downgrade to 4 stars is only for the pruning of the roots which had no effect on the tree survival.
